column2: Luchadores

The Luchadores of Mexico are a proud group of wrestlers - or "luchadors" - who regularly participate in "lucha libre" matches. This antediluvian tradition, which experienced a revival during the golden age of the Mexican Empire, now is practiced by Mexicanos and Mesoamericans alike.
Peso Pluma
Peso Medio
Peso Completo
Capitan
Peso Pluma
Peso Medio
Peso Completo
Capitan
Wrestle
Members of the Luchadores can wrestle other members and enemies.
Complete a Training Regiment.
Luchadors must be in prime condition in order to wrestle, so they can complete a training regiment put forth by the Capitan.
Wrestling Personas
Wrestling personas have been part of the lucha libre tradition since antediluvian Mexico. Choosing one of the architypes, rudo and tecnico, is a step in becoming a true luchador.
Choose a Lucha Libre Style
As a luchador, special moves are critical to performance within the ring. And so, it's necessary for a luchador to choose which of the styles they wish to focus on.
Renown
Wrestle for Honor
Members of The Luchadores often wrestle one another, for practice and recreation. It is not a duty one neglects without the notice of one's peers...
Complete Training Regiment
Luchadors must be in prime condition in order to wrestle, so they can complete a training regiment put forth by the Capitan.
Choose a Wrestling Persona
Wrestling personas have been part of the lucha libre tradition since antediluvian Mexico. Choosing one of the architypes, rudo and tecnico, is a step in becoming a true luchador.
demonstration match
match for honor
match for glory
Wrestle
Challenge [This.GetTitledFirstName] to a wrestling match to uphold your honor. Matches can be considered dangerous to your health.
Complete a Training Regiment.

As a member of The Luchadores, you need to be in peak physical performance to hold your own in the ring. The Capitan of The Luchadores has devised a training regiment so members can keep their bodies in shape.
Choose a Lucha Libre Persona
Wrestling personas have been part of the lucha libre tradition since antediluvian Mexico. Choosing one of the architypes, rudo and tecnico, is a step in becoming a true luchador.
Choose a Lucha Libre Style
As a luchador, special moves are critical to performance within the ring. And so, it's necessary for a luchador to choose which of the styles they wish to focus on.

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

As members of [Root.Society.GetName] we strive to better ourselves and each other! One way is the occasional sparring match, for practice and honor.
Seek out and wrestle the [duel_target.GetSocietyRank] [duel_target.GetFirstName] – you will find [duel_target.GetHerHim] in [duel_target.Location.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

[Root.Society.GetNameCap] have been watching you, and I believe it is time for us to meet in the sparring ring. A [duel_target.GetSocietyRank] cannot afford to get rusty! What say you? Will you seek me out for an honorable match?
I will be waiting for you in [duel_target.Location.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
[combatant_1.GetBestName] has challenged you to a [combatant_1.GetDuelType]. The only respectable response would be to accept the challenge.

My [hero_character.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.Society.GetName], [hero_character.GetTitledName], informs me that [combatant_1.GetBestName] needs someone to partake in a [combatant_1.GetDuelType], in an attempt for the eager recruit to prove [combatant_1.GetHerselfHimself] to us. The only respectable response would be to agree to help out.
[From.GetBestName] has chosen to accept your challenge to a wrestling match. The match will take place in the next few days.

[hero_character.GetBestName] and [From.Society.GetName] have chosen [From.GetTitledName] as my opponent. The [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman] eyes me up and down when we are introduced. "Fresh meat, eh?" [From.GetSheHe] offers mockingly, before shoving an elbow into my side, making everyone laugh.

[hero_character.GetBestName] and [From.Society.GetName] have chosen [From.GetTitledName] as my opponent. "Is this a joke"? I ask, my [From.GetRootRelation] smiling innocently. "It is but a formality, my dear" [From.GetSheHe] shrugs. I let out a nervous laugh.

[From.GetTitledName] has volunteered as my opponent. I am uncertain what [From.GetSheHe] thinks of my lineage, and judging from the whispers surrounding us as we shake hands, so is [From.GetSheHe]... "Best of luck to you both!" [hero_character.GetBestName] says, shooting [From.GetFirstName] a reassuring glance. I let go of [From.GetManWoman]'s grip, noticing the sweat of [From.GetHerHis] hand.
A [GetDuelType], huh?
That's what I thought...
The match will take place within the next few days.\n

Not so fast, a voice whispers in my ear, as I'm preparing to turn in for the night. I turn around, but something stings my throat. A dagger? "We WILL wrestle, dear [Root.GetFirstName], do you understand? Nod if you understand." Panic pounding in my chest, I nod, carefully as to not hurt myself further. "Good", the [From.GetManWoman] says, and pulls away into the dark.
You gulp, as it seems you have no choice. You will wrestle [From.GetTitledName]!, in a few days time.\n

While attempting to talk some sense into [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName], in regards to [combatant_2.GetHerHim] declining my challenge, I have decided to sneak into [combatant_2.GetHerHis] [combatant_2.GetCapitalHolding]. Fidgeting with the dagger in my sleeve, I have a good feeling about this, when suddenly I hear people shouting. "Who goes there?" they demand, and I am surrounded by guards.

As the match goes on, [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] and I get more and more desparate with grapples and finishing moves. I finally grab him and attempt to land a final blow, but [combatant_2.GetSheHe] overpowers me and flings us out of the ring, with both of our heads landing... akwardly on the floor.

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is moving sluggishly. Perhaps it's due to the special breakfast I had my agents prepare for [other_combatant.GetHerHim], but it is clear that the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] is not in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] best form. Before anyone catches on, I attack with full force. It feels almost too easy.

My body is cramping, as [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] braces for another attack. The following moments are a blur, blood suddenly everywhere, somebody shouting. "Did [Root.GetTitledFirstName] just [Root.GetKillingBlow]?!"

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] throws out [other_combatant.GetHerHis] moves [other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly]. The fight has gone on forever, and my muscles are beginning to ache. With the remainder of my strength I [Root.GetKillingBlow].
My opponent seems to be getting tired, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] moves becoming slower. Strengthened by the cheers of the crowd, I [Root.GetKillingBlow].

It seems like ages have passed in the ring as both [other_combatant.GetBestName] and I begin to use more and more dangerous moves. Thinking quickly, I perch myself upon the ropes and leap forward towards [other_combatant.GetHerHim], elbow at the front. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] doesn't last long.

[other_combatant.GetBestName] and I are starting to grab without any plan, wildly flailing with each other in our grasp. I finally get out of [other_combatant.GetHerHis] grip and quickly punch [other_combatant.GetHerHim] in the throat. I watch in awe as they collapse instantly.

[other_combatant.GetBestName] is quickly becoming and equal in my mind as my unrelenting fury of blows seemingly do not land. However, I spot and hole in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] defense, and I land a series of hard blows against [other_combatant.GetHerHis] body. I step back when I realize that blood is seeping out of [other_combatant.GetFirstName]'s body.

I am running out of options as [other_combatant.GetBestName] does not fall prey to my style. I decide to go all in and attempt to incapacitate [other_combatant.GetHerHim]. I extend my foot, trip my foe, and give [other_combatant.GetHerHim] a series of blows. It is not long until I realize [other_combatant.GetHerHim] stopped breathing.

My [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] seems unaware that the little wound I inflicted is what is causing [other_combatant.GetHerHis] limbs to slowly go numb... "Valiant effort!" I proclaim, watching [other_combatant.GetHerHis] sluggish movements. When [other_combatant.GetSheHe] lunges at me, I carefully step aside, letting [other_combatant.GetHerHis] subsequent collapse look like a failed attack. The poison must have reached [other_combatant.GetHerHis] heart.

Impressive! [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] splutters, on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] knees in the [Root.Capital.GetGroundDesc]. Finally, I let the anger fill me. "I had your 'solution' switched", I hiss, as I take my fist to [other_combatant.GetHerHis] throat. "I have eyes and ears everywhere", I explain to the bewildered [other_combatant.GetManWoman]. "You thought I'd let you *poison* me?"
You win the match.\n

Just as I begin to think that I am wearing my opponent down, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] lunges at me, with more force than so far displayed. Sweat drips down my forehead, when suddenly, I hear someone shouting, describing the scene incredulously. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] has managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe].

The fight has been going on for some time and it's with some effort I'm still throwing out moves, [Root.GetClumsilyElegantly]. [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] looks tired too, but suddenly [other_combatant.GetSheHe] [Root.GetKillingBlowOnMe].

Each movement of my body is becoming heavier, and I'm struggling to focus on my opponent, as the crowd cheers [other_combatant.GetHerHim] on. My vision is blurry when [other_combatant.GetSheHe] [other_combatant.GetKillingBlowOnMe].

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is moving [other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly], yet I can barely even muster the strength to hold myself upright. "You look tired, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] says, stepping closer. I want to protest, but my head is swimming. Smirking, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] swings [other_combatant.GetHerHis] fist, and [Root.GetKillingBlowOnMeShort].

Ages have seemingly passed as [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] and I begin to use more dangerous moves. Suddenly, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] perches [other_combatant.GetHerHim]self upon the ropes of the ring, and jumps towards me. The the last thing I hear are my ribs breaking.

[other_combatant.GetBestName] and I are starting to throw out any move that comes to the top of our heads. [other_combatant.GetBestName] rips [other_combatant.GetHerselfHimself] out of my grasp, and punches me in the throat. I collapse attempting to take in air with no luck.

In both speed and strength I am matching my foe [other_combatant.GetBestName]. However, I left a hole in my defense, and [other_combatant.GetBestName] quickly takes advantage in this, and lands multiple devastating blows.
You lose the match.\n

The match has gone on for what feels like hours – the initial confidence I felt has begun to wane, and my movements are getting sloppy. Then, just as my knees are about to give way under me, I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow].

As the match begins, [other_combatant.GetTitledName] comes at me slowly. I offer [other_combatant.GetHerHim] my best taunting smile, and it does not take long before I have seen to [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow].

The onlookers are cheering for me, as I swing my fists with increasing enthusiasm. When it's over, [other_combatant.GetTitledName] is on the ground, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face red with embarrassment. I shrug, smiling to the crowd, and at my opponent.

For a moment I am worried that [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is going to fall, but [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] does not appear to notice my sabotage. All I need to do is land a blow in the right area and... There! The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] is spinning, clutching [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetBodyPartInjured], screaming in pain.

It's a good day for wrestling!, I chuckle, stretching out all the necessary muscles. "Enough talking", my opponent growls. Soon, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is lying face down in the [Root.Capital.GetGroundDesc], as I have seen to [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow].

My opponent looks nervous, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] mask a little ill-fitting, and I briefly contemplate asking if [other_combatant.GetSheHe] would rather do this another day... A moment later, I snap out of it, letting the fresh morning air sharpen my senses instead. The [other_combatant.GetCharacterLook] [other_combatant.GetManWoman] is soon on the ground, groaning in pain.

The sun is beginning to set when I meet with [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName], my body ready. After [other_combatant.GetSheHe] [other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly] dodges one attack, my next one lands perfectly. Frantically, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] attempts to cover [other_combatant.GetHerHis] injured [other_combatant.GetBodyPartInjured], but I have rarely seen such a purple bruise...!

As the match goes on, I begin to recall the training in the Eagle tactics. I rip myself from [other_combatant.GetBestName]'s grasp and perch upon the ropes. Although the impact of the descent did incapacitate [other_combatant.GetBestName], it also injured me.

The match between [other_combatant.GetBestName] and I quickly turned into a grappling match, with the tide rarely turning in the midst of it. After temporarily losing my footing and receiving a blow for it, I found an opening in my opponent's defense, and ended the match soon after.

[other_combatant.GetBestName], being exceptionally defensive in the match, did not leave much room for my style to take its effects. After each of us landed multiple blows, I finally got the upper hand when I exploited one of [other_combatant.GetBestName]'s wide attack.

I am swinging my arms wildly, when suddenly, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] shrieks in pain. Stopping my crazed flailing, I am stuck staring at the mess I have made. It seems I have managed to [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow].

A simple [combatant_1.GetDuelType] or not, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] has an air of unquestioned confidence about [other_combatant.GetHerHim]. When I charge, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] snickers. At the end of it all, I am lying on the ground, after my opponent made sure to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe].
[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] charges at me, and has soon managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe]. The crowd does not seem impressed by my effort.

The onlookers are cheering for [other_combatant.GetTitledName], as [other_combatant.GetSheHe] is swinging [other_combatant.GetHerHis] fists with increasing enthusiasm. When it's over, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] looks at me with pity.

I instructed the squire to weaken one of my opponent's body parts, but I am having trouble spotting the sabotage. "Are you making a wish?" [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] asks, impatiently – we have been at this for hours, and my scheming has lead nowhere. I back away, clutching my [GetBodyPartInjured]. [GetSeverityOfInjuryCap].

Don't look so glum, [other_combatant.GetTitledName] offers. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] has me on the ground, *again*, and I am losing any patience I ever had. "You oaf-" I begin, but I collapse from the pain. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] has managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe], and the clear scent of blood has me dizzy.

I am not sure what is wrong with me, but nothing I do has any effect on [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]. "Come on, don't give up already!" [other_combatant.GetSheHe] commands, disgruntlement clear in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] voice. I try to rise, but I can't. My [Root.GetBodyPartInjured] hurts like it never has before. "I am just going to rest a little, here in the [Root.Capital.GetGroundDesc]", I mumble.

Pain is throbbing in my [GetBodyPartInjured], and I clench my jaw, trying not to cry. "It's not over!" I growl, but my opponent is lowering [other_combatant.GetHerHis] fists. The last rays of the evening sun envelops [other_combatant.GetHerHim], and suddenly, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] looks like a warrior sent by the heavens themselves...! In an attempt to say something about it, I pass out.

[other_combatant.GetTitledName] is swinging [other_combatant.GetHerHis] fists wildly, when suddenly, a shriek of pain cuts through the air. Staggering, I realize that the voice is my own – my opponent has managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe].

[other_combatant.GetBestName] and I were duking it out pretty evenly over the course of our match until [other_combatant.GetSheHe] ripped [other_combatant.GetHerselfHimself] out of my grasp. All of a sudden, [other_combatant.GetFirstName] did an Aguila move, and it was over. Although I was defeated, I saw [other_combatant.GetFirstName] stumble away from me, grasping [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [GetBodyPartInjured].

The match between [other_combatant.GetBestName] and I soon devolved into a grappling mess, with the chances of victory ebbing and flowing. After I caught [other_combatant.GetFirstName] off-guard, I had my blow returned to be tenfold.

My defensive strategy seemed to be working against [other_combatant.GetBestName]'s aggresive style, until I left myself wide open. Even though in my struggle I landed some blows, I was soon pinned and defeated.

I was holding my fists in front of me, locking eyes with [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]. The crowd began to whisper, as my opponent fidgeted awkwardly, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face growing paler. I thought [other_combatant.GetSheHe] was about to faint, when the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] started running, away from me.
Still shivering, I cannot explain what happened. When it all came down to it, my legs gave way and I simply... I fled the match! I am such a coward..! Why did I ever agree to this in the first place?
Just as I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow], [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] manages to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe]. However, the crowd is chanting MY name!

My [GetBodyPartInjured] hurts, but it somehow doesn't seem as bad as what my opponent is suffering. "I'm not done!", [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] says, through gritted teeth, but then [other_combatant.GetSheHe] lies back down on the ground, rolling around wildly. When I step closer [other_combatant.GetSheHe] splutters: "No no, I'm done! I yield!".

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is taken aback when I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]. "[Root.GetTitledFirstName] wins!" someone proclaims, and my opponent groans. I am ignoring the pain in my [GetBodyPartInjured], but I have a suspicion [GetSeverityOfInjury].
As I drop from the skies on to my opponent, I realize that I landed a bit wrong. Although I did injure my [GetBodyPartInjured], the referee proclaims me the victor.
[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]'s hits have been damaging to me, but I bear it and land a devastating blow. Which knocks [other_combatant.GetHerHim] down.

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] and I seem to equally trade blows throughout the match, however, I find a weakness and make good work of it. Although I am in pain, [other_combatant.GetBestName] is on the ground, groaning in pain.

Just as I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow], [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] manages to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe]. Dizzy, I can just about make out the sounds of the crowd: it is not my name they are chanting.

No, I can still fight! I say, dropping to my knees, sensing my own lie. Even though [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] has clearly injured [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetBodyPartInjured], [other_combatant.GetSheHe] has been proclaimed the winner. Sighing, I ponder my own worst injury. I have a feeling [Root.GetSeverityOfInjury].

You don't give up, do you? my opponent laughs. "I've thought about it", I mutter, attempting to stand. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] did just [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe]... As I slump back on the ground, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] smiles in triumph.

When [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] climbed up on the ropes and began [other_combatant.GetHerHis] descent, I knew it was the end for me. Although [other_combatant.GetSheHe] did win, they did hurt themselves in the process.

Even though I was wailing on [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName], [other_combatant.GetSheHe] did not seem ready to quit. When I left myself too wide after an attempted shot, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] gave me a devastating blow.

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] and I were trading blows pretty equally, until [other_combatant.GetSheHe] spots and weakness in my office and grapples me, not letting go until [other_combatant.GetSheHe] makes the match-ending move.

[other_combatant.GetTitledName] has already managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe], when [other_combatant.GetSheHe] lets out an angry grunt. Before I know it, I am begging for mercy, but [other_combatant.GetSheHe] is beyond reasoning. The last thing I hear is the shocked gasp of the crowd, and a soft thud, which can only be my head hitting the ground.

[other_combatant.GetTitledName] has already managed to [Root.GetWrestlingInjuringBlowOnMe], when something twisted passes over [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face. I barely register the glint of something metal in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] hand, before my throat is cut open, blood spraying on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face. I try to ask why, but no words come out.

I know that there wasn't really anything at stake during the mock match that took place between us, yet I find myself filling with rage whenever anyone mentions [other_combatant.GetTitledName], and it's making servants flinch. But does it matter? I am the [Root.GetTitle]! Am I not allowed to loathe that [other_combatant.GetManWoman]?!

There are noises. Metal, clanging. A fight? Are those soldiers practicing, or is this another nightmare? The twisted face of [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName], as [other_combatant.GetSheHe] is laughing at me, after our duel? My heart racing, I still cannot move from my bed.

Sometimes, when I see my soldiers practicing their wrestling skills in the training grounds, the face of [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] flashes before my mind's eye, and I relive the match we fought. It sends my heart racing, how I failed to defend my honor. Some days, the shame is overwhelming.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has apparently slipped into a deep slumber, and does not show any signs of waking. However, I am told that the last thing anyone heard [From.GetHerHim] talking about was our match and how [From.GetSheHe] would find a way to take revenge on me...

Since the match, I have been practicing a bit with [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] did best me, and I was quick to ask for any pointers. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] seemed surprised at first, but today I am proud to tell [other_combatant.GetHerHim] that [other_combatant.GetSheHe]'s a good teacher. "And friend!" I add.

I have recently found myself talking with [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] for hours, about [other_combatant.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak]. I have to laugh, however, when the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] attempts to compliment my wrestling technique – we both know that I didn't do very well, last time we sparred.

After the match, [From.GetTitledName] asked me for advice on fighting. A little taken aback, I happily offered to train with [From.GetHerHim], on occasion. Today, [From.GetSheHe] thanks me, for being a good teacher. "And friend," [From.GetSheHe] adds, dunking me on the back, before [From.GetSheHe] cocks [From.GetHerHis] head, in direction of the ring.

I have recently found myself becoming friendly with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] chuckles heartily, however, when I attempt to compliment the [From.GetManWoman] on [From.GetHerHis] wrestling technique. "My [Root.GetLordLady], we both know that I did not do very well, last time we sparred", [From.GetSheHe] says.

Ever since we wrestled, I have been having daydreams, about [other_combatant.GetFirstName]. I keep seeing [other_combatant.GetHerHim] in my mind's eye, and my heart flutters. I can't tell [other_combatant.GetHerHim] though... [other_combatant.GetRootRomanticWorry]

It's dark when I jolt awake, my heart pounding in my chest. Wiping the sweat from my brow, the memory of my dream lingers. I was wrestling [other_combatant.GetFirstName] again, but instead of delivering the winning blow, this time, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] put [other_combatant.GetHerHis] arm around my waist, and pulled me in for a kiss. When will these dreams end?

I thought I saw [other_combatant.GetFirstName] today, in the ring. I was wrong, and the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] was startled to find [other_combatant.GetHerHis] liege putting a hand on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] shoulder. Embarrassed, I fled. Oh, why does my heart long for [other_combatant.GetFirstName]? [other_combatant.GetRootRomanticWorry]

Ever since [other_combatant.GetFirstName] bested me in our match, I yearn to be near [other_combatant.GetHerHim], even more than before. I'm filled with thoughts and visions of us together, yet I dare not approach [other_combatant.GetHerHim]. [other_combatant.GetRootRomanticWorry]

I've had trouble sleeping, ever since the duel with [other_combatant.GetFirstName], and it's affecting my temper. When my councilors begged me to clarify my thoughts on a matter, I simply blurted out that "[other_combatant.GetRootRomanticWorry]"

My [craven_ruler.GetRootRelation] confesses that [craven_ruler.GetSheHe] has recently turned down another match [craven_ruler.GetSheHe] was challenged to. I am not sure what words of comfort I can offer, but I understand [craven_ruler.GetHerHis] feelings of guilt and shame. Is this the ruler [craven_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName] should have?

[craven_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] recently turned down another match [craven_ruler.GetSheHe] was challenged to. At first I was embarrassed, on behalf of all [craven_ruler.GetHerHis] subjects, but who am I to say I would not react the same way? Perhaps there is value in choosing your battles...?
A fellow member of [Root.Society.GetName], §Y[lodge_member_killed.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!, has been killed in combat by §Y[lodge_member_killer.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!!
[FromFrom.GetTitledName] suffered an untimely death before we could see to our match. I'll have to approach [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName] anew.

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

It has come to our attention that you have not been training in the recent months. To be a successful luchador, you must be in prime fitness at all times. Go to one of our training stations to get yourself in shape!

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
Arriving at my local training center, I am met with the sight of men and women, some of them my brothers and sister in Los Luchadores. All I hope is that I do not do anything stupid in front of them.
I just have to focus on my regiment.
Over the next few days, you will train to reach the standards of [Root.Society.GetTitledGrandMasterName].
Partway into my training regiment, as I am pressing a particularly heavy set of weights, my hand suddenly slips, causing my other arm to contort in a way it should not have.
As I was lifting a heavy set of weights, one of my legs gives way. The next few second feel like hours as I witness my leg flop awkwardly.
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Your skills do not improve after this session.
After a few days of graceless excercise and the burn of stares from more experienced people, I have finally completed my mandated training regiment.
I... don't feel much stronger.
Your skills barely improve.
Several days of workout later, and I feel as if I am finally getting somewhere with this excercise stuff!
I feel great!
Your skills improve.
After finishing the last of my reps, I instantly feel a change. Working out is starting to become easy!
I could go for a couple more rounds of this stuff.
Wrapping up the last of my workouts, it feels easier and easier to do this stuff after each excercise I go through.
Absolute lightwork!
Your skills greatly improve.

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
We are pleased with your progress. During the time you spent training you have taken a great steps in improving yourself within the ring. Hereby I declare your mission completed.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
You honor me, [From.GetSocietyRank].

To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
I have heard some disturbing tales regarding your time at the gym, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. I fear that you are not yet ready for the training I expected of you. We will revisit this mission at a later date, but for the time being, I must consider this a failure.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
I have failed you, [From.GetSocietyRank]
After months of regularly working out, I am starting to feel... stronger...
Huzzah!

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

As a [Root.GetSocietyRank], it is your duty to partake in the tradition in making a persona. Go, and choose to be either a Rudo or a Tecnico!

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
Now that I am a [Root.GetSocietyRank], I must choose a luchador persona in accordance to the ancient rules of Lucha Libre.
I shall become a tecnico, defender of the good.
Become a tecnico, the heroes of Lucha Libre.
I shall become a rudo, defeater of the good.
Become a rudo, the villians of Lucha Libre.

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

We are pleased that you have chosen to honor the traditions of Lucha Libre! Now you are *truly* a luchador!

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
You honor me [From.GetSocietyRank]
Now that I am properly acquainted with the way of Lucha Libre, I should choose a lucha style.
I shall be the noble eagle.
Become an Aguila, the oldest of the styles.
I shall be the voracious jaguar.
Become a Jaguar, a style that values attack over all else.
I shall be the crafty snake.
Become a Serpiente, which prioritizes dodges, grapples, and swift attacks.
After being in the Luchadores for a while, I am feeling things that I never had before. Being so... close to people my sex just gets to be in a way it never did before.
I can't deny these feelings!

After adopting a tecnico persona, the attributes of a tecnico are beginning to seep into my personal life. I am now realizing that I am nicer than I was before, and I find that my vassals can notice the change as well.
If it makes my vassals happy, I am all for this!

After adopting a rudo persona, the traits normally attributed to them have begun to bleed into everyday life. I find myself flying into blind rages when a vassal disagrees with me and being all around ruder than I was before.
If my vassals don't like it they can GET OUT.
You'll approach the [new_recruit.GetManWoman] to explain the initiation match.
You agree to wrestle whoever it is that §Y[hero_character.Society.GetNameCap]§! has chosen for you.

[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] offered no protests when I explained our traditions, eyes all aglitter at the thought of an initiation match. After some inquiry, [duel_target.GetTitledName] has kindly volunteered.

[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] listened while I explained our tradition of one-on-one matches, but then rolled [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes and walked off. "I would rather not get involved with barbarians."
A sparring match will take place between §Y[new_recruit.GetTitledName]§! and §Y[duel_target.GetTitledName]§!
Just as [combatant_2.GetTitledName] was about to show [From.GetTitledName] what wrestling match should look like, the [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman] ran away...

To the brave [Root.GetTitledName],

I understand you were seriously injured during your initiation, but that you remained standing. To reward this display of strength in the match, I hereby officially invite you into our ranks.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] is making some less than subtle remarks over dinner tonight, commenting on my wrestling skills and asking how interested I am in luchadors. "Honestly, [Root.GetFirstName]... When are you going to become a member of [recruiting_parent.Society.GetName]?"

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] has joined me for dinner tonight, and not stopped talking about [new_recruit.GetHerHis] initiation match. "It was exhilarating, [Root.GetFatherMother]! And now I am one of [new_recruit.Society.GetName]!".
